column3: Traffic;SR: Drunk Chinese in BMW Mows Down Vegetable Cart Killing One Man and Injuring Two Others------On November 20
column6: a drunk Chinese man crashed his BMW into a vegetable delivery cart in Siem Reap while driving drunk
column7: killing one and injuring two others.------According to Lieutenant Jim Sovann
column8: the traffic police chief in Siem Reap
column9: the Chinese driver was unmistakably drunk and responsible for the accident. He will be charged with the death of the cart driver
column10: and police are ------preparing his case for court.------Source with more pictures: ------http://www.srpostnews.com/cambodia-news/7470.html
